__comment: Fields starting with __ are commented out. Fields with __comment are pure comment lines. Comment out lines to exclude them from the result files. key/value pairs are according to see VCF 4.2.
__comment_FILTER: See VCF 4.2, section 1.4.3. Descriptions taken from confidenceAnnotation_SNVs.py

PASS.description: Position passed all filters, call is made

s50.description: Less than 50% of samples have data

RE.description: variant in repeat_masker file region and/or simple_tandemrepeats file region, downloaded from UCSC genome browser and/or variant in segmental duplication region, annotated by annovar

BL.description: variant in dac_blacklist from ENCODE or in duke_excluded list, both downloaded from UCSC genome browser

DP.description: <= 5 reads total at position in tumor

SB.description: Strand bias of reads with mutant allele = zero reads on one strand

TAC.description: less than 6 reads in Tumor at position

dbSNP.description: variant in dbSNP database used: dbsnp_indel

HSDEPTH.description: variant in hiseq_depth region, downloaded from UCSC genome browser

MAP.description: variant overlaps a region from mapability_file

SBAF.description: Strand bias of reads with mutant allele = zero reads on one strand and variant allele frequency below 0.1

TAR.description: Only one alternative read in Tumor at position

DPHIGH.description: Too many reads mapped in control at this region

DPLOWC.description: Only 5 or less reads in control

1PS.description: Only two alternative reads, one on each strand

ALTCFR.description: Alternative reads in control and tumor allele frequency below 0.3

FRC.description: Variant allele frequency below 0.3 in germline call

YALT.description: Variant on Y chromosome with low allele frequency

VAF.description: Variant allele frequency in tumor < ' + str(args.newpun) + ' times allele frequency in control

VAF_ctrl.description: Variant allele frequency in tumor < ' + str(args.newpun) + ' times allele frequency in control

BI.description: Bias towards a PCR strand or sequencing strand

VAFC.description: Variant allele frequency in tumor < 5% or variant allele frequency in control > 5%

GTQFRT.description: Quality for genotypes below thresholds and variant allele frequency in tumor < 10%

ALTT.description: Less than three variant reads in tumor

QUAL.description: Quality of entry too low and/or low coverage in region

alleleBias.description: Variant frequency is lower than expected for het.

badReads.description: Variant supported only by reads with low quality bases close to variant position, and not present on both strands.

HapScore.description: Too many haplotypes are supported by the data in this region.

MQ.description: Bad Root-mean-square mapping quality of covering reads/reads at the position

FT.description: Sample genotype filter indicating if this genotype was called SUBFIELDS???

PL.description: Phred-scaled genotype likelihoods rounded to closest integer

MQ.description: Root-mean-square mapping quality of covering reads/reads at the position

AC1.description: Max-likelihood estimate of the first ALT allele count (no HWE assumption)

AF2.description: Max-likelihood estimate of the first and second group ALT allele frequency (assuming HWE)

AF1.description: Max-likelihood estimate of the first ALT allele frequency (assuming HWE)

NR.description: Number of reads covering variant location in this sample

NV.description: Number of reads containing variant in this sample

FREQ.description: High frequency in GnomAD(>0.1%) or in local control database (>0.05%)

__comment_INFO: See VCF 4.2, section 1.4.2. Keys starting with double underscore are commented out.

__AN.description: Total number of alleles in called genotypes

__CIGAR.description: Cigar string describing how to align an alternate allele to the reference allele

__END.description: End position of the variant described in this record

__MQ0.description: Number of MAPQ == 0 reads covering this record

CSQ.description: Consequence annotations from Ensembl VEP. Format: Allele|Consequence|IMPACT|SYMBOL|Gene|Feature_type|Feature|BIOTYPE|EXON|INTRON|HGVSc|HGVSp|cDNA_position|CDS_position|Protein_position|Amino_acids|Codons|Existing_variation|DISTANCE|STRAND|FLAGS|SYMBOL_SOURCE|HGNC_ID

__START.description: Start position of reference call block

SbPval.description: Binomial P-value for strand bias test

MGOF.description: Worst goodness-of-fit value reported across all samples

MQ0F.description: Fraction of MQ0 reads (smaller is better)

MQSB.description: Mann-Whitney U test of Mapping Quality vs Strand Bias (bigger is better)

BQB.description: Mann-Whitney U test of Base Quality Bias (bigger is better)

RPB.description: Mann-Whitney U test of Read Position Bias (bigger is better)

VDB.description: Variant Distance Bias for filtering splice-site artefacts in RNA-seq data (bigger is better)

IMF.description: Maximum fraction of reads supporting an indel

IDV.description: Maximum number of reads supporting an indel

INDEL.description: Indicates that the variant is an INDEL.

ReadPosRankSum.description: Mann-Whitney Rank sum test for difference between in positions of variants in reads from ref and alt.

SC.description: Genomic sequence 10 bases either side of variant positiony

BRF.description: Fraction of reads around this variant that failed filters.

HapScore.description: Haplotype score measuring the number of haplotypes the variant is segregating into in a window.

NR.description: Total number of reverse reads containing this variant

TCF.description: Total forward strand coverage at this locus

NF.description: Total number of forward reads containing this variant

TR.description: Total number of reads containing this variant

PP.description: Posterior probability (phred scaled) that this variant segregates

Source.description: Was this variant suggested by Playtypus, Assembler, or from a VCF?

HP.description: Homopolymer run length around variant locus

TCR.description: Total reverse strand coverage at this locus

MMLQ.description: Median minimum base quality for bases around variant

INFO.__comment_DKFZ: DKFZ in-house INFO fields. Freestanding columns must have a 'new_info_id' to be extracted into the new spec-conforming VCF's INFO field. Their key must be the column header name as it occurs in the in-house input file.

DP4.description: Number of high-quality ref-forward , ref-reverse, alt-forward and alt-reverse bases

HWE.description: Chi^2 based HWE test P-value based on G3

PV4.description: P-values for strand bias, baseQ bias, mapQ bias and tail distance bias

FQ.description: Phred probability of all samples being the same

ANNOVAR_FUNCTION.description: Functional classification of the variant by ANNOVAR

EXONIC_CLASSIFICATION.description: Functional implication if variation is located with respect to exon

ANNOVAR_TRANSCRIPTS.description: Details of non-synonymous variation's impact on protein

CONFIDENCE.description: Empirical confidence level of call, ten levels (1-10), >7=trustworthy

RECLASSIFICATION.description: Reclassification of the germline/somatic state based on additional information
